episode.title: 坊ちゃんと満月の流星群
The Duke and the Meteor Shower During the Full Moon
Bocchan to Mangetsu no Ryuuseigun
episode.summary: After losing a bet to Alice, the Duke agrees to take her to the town’s masquerade festival. But the two get separated when the Duke, clad in a clunky, steel costume to protect others from his touch of death, gets carried away by the crowd… Source: Funimation
